## Cramer-Rao lower bound

Let $Y_1,...,Y_n$ be a sample from a distribution with probability function $f(y|\theta)$, and let $\widehat{\theta}$ be an estimator of $\theta \in \mathbb{R}$. Under regularity conditions,
$$Var_{\theta}(\widehat{\theta}) \geq \dfrac{\left(\frac{d}{d\theta} \mathbb{E}_{\theta}(\widehat{\theta}) \right)^2}{\mathbb{E}_{\theta}\left[ \left(\frac{d}{d\theta} \log f(Y_1,...,Y_n | \theta) \right)^2 \right]}$$
